items.title: My Multiple Choice Exercise with static order
items.label: ex:myMultiChoice2

exerciseData.code:
x/y/z/w = rand(10, 20);    
c1 = x > w
c2 = y > w
c3 = z > w

fu(u,v) = diff(f,u)
fv(u,v) = diff(f,v)

This example shows how to change the keyboard for the input field to
Arrange the following numbers to get the first numbers of the Fibonacci sequence (solution is

exerciseData.code:
n = rand(5,10)        
f = zeros<n>()        
f[0] = 0
f[1] = 1
for k from 2 to n-1 {     
    f[k] = f[k-2] + f[k-1]
}
